# OpenJobs

> AI-powered job scraper for extracting job listings from any careers page

## What is OpenJobs?

OpenJobs is a Python library that scrapes job listings from company careers pages using:
- Firecrawl for JavaScript rendering (handles React, Next.js, Vue SPAs)
- Google Gemini AI for intelligent job extraction
- Fallback embedded JSON extraction for React/Next.js data structures

## Quick Start

```python
from openjobs import scrape_careers_page, discover_careers_url

# Scrape jobs from a careers page
jobs = scrape_careers_page("https://stripe.com/jobs")

# Or discover the careers URL first
url = discover_careers_url("anthropic.com")
jobs = scrape_careers_page(url)
```

## Core Functions

### scrape_careers_page(url, company_name=None)
Scrape job listings from a careers page URL.
Returns: List of job dicts with title, company, location, department, job_url, slug, date_scraped

### discover_careers_url(domain)
Find the careers page URL from a company domain.
Example: discover_careers_url("stripe.com") -> "https://stripe.com/jobs/search"

### process_jobs(jobs, enrich=True, filter_categories=None)
Enrich jobs with AI categorization, tech stack extraction, salary parsing.
Categories: Software Engineering, Data, Product, Design, Sales, Marketing, etc.

## Environment Variables

- GOOGLE_API_KEY (required): Gemini API key for AI extraction
- FIRECRAWL_URL: Self-hosted Firecrawl URL (default: cloud API)
- FIRECRAWL_API_KEY: Firecrawl cloud API key

## Output Format

```json
{
  "company": "Linear",
  "title": "Senior Software Engineer",
  "department": "Product",
  "location": "Remote",
  "job_url": "https://linear.app/careers/...",
  "slug": "linear-senior-software-engineer",
  "date_scraped": "2025-01-08T10:00:00"
}
```

## Supported Sites

Works with most careers pages including:
- Company websites (stripe.com, linear.app, figma.com)
- JavaScript SPAs (React, Next.js, Vue)
- ATS platforms (Lever, Greenhouse, Ashby)
- Heavy SPAs (Retool, Airtable, Vercel, Notion)

Not supported: LinkedIn, Indeed, Glassdoor (blocked by ToS)

## Installation

```bash
pip install requests tenacity
git clone https://github.com/federicodeponte/openjobs.git
```

## Self-Hosted Firecrawl

For unlimited free scraping:
```bash
docker compose up -d
export FIRECRAWL_URL=http://localhost:3002
```

## Links

- Repository: https://github.com/federicodeponte/openjobs
- Firecrawl: https://firecrawl.dev
- Gemini API: https://aistudio.google.com/apikey
